item.title: Welcome to the Salmon Blog
item.description: We're launching the Salmon blog — a space for insights on CRM data quality, revenue operations, and the future of AI-powered enrichment.
item.author: Salmon Team

item.title: Why Your CRM Data Decays 30% Every Year
item.description: B2B contact data decays at an alarming rate — 30 to 40 percent every year. Here's why it happens, what it actually costs, and what you can do about it.
item.author: Salmon Team
